doc:
Take a seq of source file names and return a map from
   file number to integer index.
name: indexed-sources

doc:
Take a seq of source file names and return a comparator
   that can be used to construct a sorted map.
name: source-compare

doc:
Take a source map segment represented as a vector
   and return a map.
name: seg->map

doc:
Combine a source map segment vector and a relative
   source map segment vector and combine them to get
   an absolute segment posititon information as a vector.
name: seg-combine

doc:
Helper for decode-reverse. Take a source map and update it
  based on a segment map.
name: update-reverse-result

doc:
Convert a v3 source map JSON object into a nested sorted map
   organized as file, line, and column. Note this source map
   maps from *original* source location to generated source location.
name: decode-reverse

doc:
Helper for decode. Take a source map and update it based on a
  segment map.
name: update-result

doc:
Convert a v3 source map JSON object into a nested sorted map
   organized as file, line, and column. Note this source map
   maps from *generated* source location to original source
   location.
name: decode

doc:
Take a nested sorted map encoding line and column information
   for a file and return a vector of vectors of encoded segments.
   Each vector represents a line, and the internal vectors are segments
   representing the contents of the line.
name: lines->segs

doc:
Relativize a path using :source-map-path if provided or the parent directory
   otherwise.
name: relativize-path

doc:
Take an internal source map representation represented as nested
   sorted maps of file, line, column and return a v3 representation.
name: encode*

doc:
Take an internal source map representation represented as nested
   sorted maps of file, line, column and return a source map v3 JSON
   string.
name: encode

doc:
Merge an internal source map representation of a single
   ClojureScript file mapping original to generated with a
   second source map mapping original JS to generated JS.
   The is to support source maps that work through multiple
   compilation steps like Google Closure optimization passes.
name: merge-source-maps

doc:
Given a ClojureScript to JavaScript source map, invert it. Useful when
   mapping JavaScript stack traces when environment support is unavailable.
name: invert-reverse-map

doc:
Take a seq of source file names and return a map from
   file number to integer index. For reverse source maps.
name: indexed-sources

doc:
Take a seq of source file names and return a comparator
   that can be used to construct a sorted map. For reverse
   source maps.
name: source-compare

doc:
Take a source map segment represented as a vector
   and return a map.
name: seg->map

doc:
Combine a source map segment vector and a relative
   source map segment vector and combine them to get
   an absolute segment posititon information as a vector.
name: seg-combine

doc:
Helper for decode-reverse. Take a reverse source map and
  update it with a segment map.
name: update-reverse-result

doc:
Convert a v3 source map JSON object into a reverse source map
  mapping original ClojureScript source locations to the generated
  JavaScript.
name: decode-reverse

doc:
Helper for decode. Take a source map and update it based on a
  segment map.
name: update-result

doc:
Convert a v3 source map JSON object into a source map mapping
  generated JavaScript source locations to the original
  ClojureScript.
name: decode

doc:
Take a nested sorted map encoding line and column information
   for a file and return a vector of vectors of encoded segments.
   Each vector represents a line, and the internal vectors are segments
   representing the contents of the line.
name: lines->segs

doc:
Take an internal source map representation represented as nested
   sorted maps of file, line, column and return a source map v3 JSON
   string.
name: encode

doc:
Merge an internal source map representation of a single
   ClojureScript file mapping original to generated with a
   second source map mapping original JS to generated JS.
   The is to support source maps that work through multiple
   compilation steps like Google Closure optimization passes.
name: merge-source-maps

doc:
Given a ClojureScript to JavaScript source map, invert it. Useful when
   mapping JavaScript stack traces when environment support is unavailable.
name: invert-reverse-map
